text:
Hello everyone,

I try to list all the authors of my blog with the blog_out function but it doesn't display authors who don't have published articles.
Any solutions?
Thanks for your answer . Yes it's what i'm using to get a list of my authors. But it retrieves only the author with article/post..
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/blog/v3/list-blog-authors>
you’ll probably have to do so via api
HubSpot had an html module

Hi all! Is it possible to add a custom class to a dnd section, column, or row? Or is it just dnd_area? My goal here is wanting to be able to do things like forcing all the text in a section to be white or adding an overlay on a background image. Thanks in advance!
anybody successfully use the HubL Menu function to make breadcrumbs? <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/hubl/functions#menu>
Hello, has anyone worked with crm_objects?, I try to show a properties of company, in mode preview it's working, but in landing page it's no working
when i use the `breadcrumb` root_type parameter it only outputs the current page
i believe you can only do areas for now because i ran into a similar issue recently but nothing worked
Is the page password-protected or uses content memberships?
Gotcha. Just wanted to make sure I wasnt missing something. Thanks!
the page it's not protected, it's necessary?

I constantly come back to this, but the ability to ad dynamic content from hubdb for dynamic page template from front end would be great...
This would also allow the use of dNd templates with dynamic pages with out needing a module for everything

Anyone know why the hubl filters won't work on `tag` in the second line? The CLI keeps giving me an error.

```java.lang.ClassCastException: class com.HubSpot.content.model.TagWithUsageStats cannot be cast to class java.lang.String (com.HubSpot.content.model.TagWithUsageStats is in unnamed module of loader 'app'; java.lang.String is in module java.base of loader 'bootstrap')```
is it possible to access global module config on a page?
after including the global module, I don’t see it in the `content` variable or `widget_data` - with and without `export_to_template_context` turned on or not
<@U3T21PDBK> , doing this via API will reveal our API key, so what are your suggestions for this ??
Can you throw in a `|string` filter before lower?
Morning, within a modules can you add if statements that target browser screen size?
